publicationStmt.publisher: Uppsala University, Department of linguistics and philology

msIdentifier.repository: Wroblewski Library of the Lithuanian Academy of Sciences in Vilniuse, Lithuania

msContents.summary: Translations of Biblical texts into North-Western Karaim: The Latter Prophets, The Twelve Minor Prophets, the Sifrei Emet (Psalms, Proverbs, Job), and the Five Megillot (Song of Songs, Ruth, Lamentations, Ecclesiastes, Esther)

ab.title: Isaiah 4
ab.l:
Da tutarlar ḱop qatynlar bir kišini ol ḱuńd́a ajtadoɣoč ėt́ḿagimiźni ašarbyz da upraɣymyzny kijarbiź ančaḥ atalsyn šemij
üśt́uḿuźǵa ėksit́siń rusvajlyɣymyzny.
Ol ḱuńd́a bolur mašijaḥy H-nyn ḱorkḱa da syjɣa da jemiši ol jerniń ulluluḥḫa da ḱorkḱa qutul- ɣanyna Jisraʾeĺniń.
Da bolur ol qalɣan Cijonda da ol qalɣan Jerušalajimd́a anyn ajtylyr anar bar ol jazylɣan tirlikḱa bolur Jerušalajimd́a.
Kertid́ań juvar H jerinčiligiń qyzlarynyn Cijonnun da qanly iš́ĺariń Jeru- šalajimniń čejḥar ortasyndan jeli byla t́oŕaniń da jeli ört́aḿakniń.

Da jaratyr H bar t́uźuv́u üśt́uńa tavynyn Cijonnun dmdš da midraš üv́ĺari üśt́uńa bulut ḱuńd́uź da t́ut́uń da balquvlu ot jalyn- ly keč́a byla ki bar syjly üv́ üśt́uńa bolur hašɣaḥasy T́eńriniń qaplanɣan.
Da alačyḥ bolur ḱoĺaǵaǵa ḱuńd́uź qurɣaḥtan da syjynčḥa da taǯanmaḥḫa tamčydan da jamɣurdan.
